name: places/ChIJuSzNU7pYwokRa_e6_PKItbU
formattedAddress: 336 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 336 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain retailer selling a wide array of branded spring, memory foam & adjustable mattresses.

originalText.text:
Everything about my experience at Mattress Firm was amazing. A huge thank you to Carlos for making my visit as seamless and easy as possible.

He was very knowledgeable and answered all of my questions regarding mattress comfortability, longevity, pricing, and gave me the best recommendations.

I highly recommend this Mattress Firm location and the associate Carlos to anyone moving into the Upper East Side like me.

Thanks again, Carlos!

originalText.text: Andrew is terrific. He answered all my questions clearly and did not pressure me into anything. The showroom is also very nice across two floors and is clean and shows well. The staff is also very friendly. I was able to purchase everything I needed with a convenient delivery schedule. This is my new go-to mattress place for all of my future needs. Thank you!

text.text: Andrew is terrific. He answered all my questions clearly and did not pressure me into anything. The showroom is also very nice across two floors and is clean and shows well. The staff is also very friendly. I was able to purchase everything I needed with a convenient delivery schedule. This is my new go-to mattress place for all of my future needs. Thank you!

originalText.text: My partner and I had the most wonderful experience at Mattress Firm on the UES. The customer service reps were lovely and so attentive. Specifically, Audrey provided one of the most amazing customer service experiences I have EVER had. My partner went to Mattress Firm on a previous day for an initial consultation with Audrey. He told me how wonderful the experience was and was looking forward to shopping together the next time with Audrey’s assistance. When we walked in the store, Audrey greeted me with a huge smile. She already knew my name and was so excited to guide our mattress shopping experience. That initial lovely, warm, vibrant energy carried us through the entire mattress shopping experience up to the point where my partner and I found the perfect mattress that met both of our needs and desires. Audrey helping us to find this mattress was not only a testament to her patience and wonderful personality, but also to her impressive knowledge and experience. Finding that mattress was a little tricky because my partner and I discovered our differing preferences as we tried different mattresses. But Audrey’s fantastic personality and patience made the process of trying different mattresses fun. We also felt confident with her advice and guidance. We eventually found a glorious mattress and base that we are so excited to have delivered. This was the first time my partner and I shopped for a premium mattress and we could not have done so with a better rep. If you are looking to invest in a premium mattress do yourself a favor and visit Mattress Firm on the UES. Ask for Audrey. You won’t be disappointed!

Carlos was professional and considerate. He was also reasonably generous!

So far this has been more than I expected….

Sincerely
Christian

originalText.text: Chauncey is very knowledgeable and extremely patient. He walked us through the options In our price range and helped us figure out the best fit for our sleep needs. It was a pleasure working with him!
